structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.text: [ Text of section effective until April 11, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 9, Sec. 9.] The provisions of sections sixty-one to sixty-five, inclusive, shall not apply to the board, to the registration or licensing of real estate brokers or salesmen, or to any real estate broker or salesman or to any person acting as such.
